verses.roman:
śiraḥ sutāṁś ca kāyena
pracchādyāsāra-pīḍitāḥ
vepamānā bhagavataḥ
pāda-mūlam upāyayuḥ

synonyms: śiraḥ—their heads; sutān—their children; ca—and; kāyena—by their bodies; pracchādya—covering; āsāra-pīḍitāḥ—distressed by the rainfall; vepamānāḥ—trembling; bhagavataḥ—of the Supreme Personality of Godhead; pāda-mūlam—the base of the lotus feet; upāyayuḥ—they approached .
translation: Trembling from the distress brought about by the severe rainfall, and trying to cover their heads and calves with their own bodies, the cows approached the lotus feet of the Supreme Personality of Godhead.
